text:
79Â° Porterville, CA (93257) Today Partly cloudy. Very warm. High 88F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph..
Tonight Mainly clear skies. Low around 55F. Winds light and variable.
Updated: October 11, 2024 @ 11:40 am

Here Comes The Sun (And Water) THE RECORDER recorder@portervillerecorder.com Oct 11, 2024 2 hrs ago Comments Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Facebook Twitter WhatsApp SMS Email Print Copy article link Save In this photo taken by Lonnie Eskridge the sun rises over the Tule River at Westwood on Thursday morning, the first day in which water was released into the river.
